Toby \"Jack\" Wolff.action: Sings along with Norma playing piano, joining in a group musical activity.

Toby \"Jack\" Wolff.action: Toby sits quietly on the couch after entering the house, showing no immediate reaction or engagement.

Toby \"Jack\" Wolff.action: Shakes his head 'no' when asked if he has nicotine stains on his fingers, despite teachers suspecting he has fallen in with the wrong kind of friends.
